name: Harmonize
story_text: Give the chorus a little punch.
trigger_text: The target uses an ability that targets only one enemy and costs 3 or fewer of their Heroic Resource.
effect:
The target can choose one additional target for the triggering ability. Any damage dealt to the additional target is sonic damage.

You can trigger this ability when a target uses an ability that has a Heroic Resource cost of 3 + each additional drama spent.
